sample_job_descriptions.title: AI/ML Engineer
sample_job_descriptions.description: We are seeking an experienced AI/ML Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have strong experience in Python, machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch, and cloud deployment. Responsibilities include developing ML models, working with large datasets, and deploying AI solutions at scale.
education_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

sample_job_descriptions.title: Full Stack Developer
sample_job_descriptions.description: Looking for a Full Stack Developer with experience in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies. Must have experience with REST APIs, databases, and version control systems.
education_requirements: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science

sample_job_descriptions.title: Data Scientist
sample_job_descriptions.description: Seeking a Data Scientist with strong analytical skills and experience in Python, R, machine learning, and statistical analysis. Will work on predictive modeling and data visualization projects.
education_requirements: Master's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or Computer Science
